column4: Hi , trying to u/g my xubuntu install, but the upgrade manager is only saying that there is an upgrade to 7.10 available. Is there somthing I can add to sources.lst or whatever it is to get it to see 8.04? Thanks
what version do you have?  if 7.04, then you must first upgrae to 7.10
why doesn't Ctrl+Alt+Fx switch to other consoles in hardy?
thanks. I think it is 7.04 Dang. Two >600 downloads and the local mirrors are glowing hot..
